question: 函数 $f(x) = \tan(x)$ 的定义域是？
solution: 根据三角函数的基本性质，答案是 $x \neq \frac{\pi}{2} + k\pi (k \in \mathbb{Z})$

solution: 根据三角函数的基本性质，答案是 $[-1, 1]$

question: 计算：$\sin(180^\circ) = ?$
solution: $\sin(180^\circ) = 0 \approx 0.0000$

question: 计算：$\cos(150^\circ) = ?$
solution: $\cos(150^\circ) = - \frac{\sqrt{3}}{2} \approx -0.8660$

question: 计算：$\cos(135^\circ) = ?$
solution: $\cos(135^\circ) = - \frac{\sqrt{2}}{2} \approx -0.7071$

solution: $\sin(30^\circ) = \frac{1}{2} \approx 0.5000$

question: 计算：$\sin(90^\circ) = ?$
solution: $\sin(90^\circ) = 1 \approx 1.0000$
